title: Do you have more than one Enterprise Admin?
description: This helps you make sure you do not lose access to your Enterprise

title: Have you setup billing managers?
description: This is a limited role to allow management of billing settings

title: Are you syncronizing IdP groups which you can link to GitHub Teams?
helpURLTitle: Managing team memberships with identity provider groups

title: Have you selected the types of repos you want your users to create?
helpURLTitle: Restricting repository creation in your organization

title: Have you decided if you want forking enabled/disabled for all orgs?
Have you considered who can change repository visibility?
description: You can restrict users from changing repository visibility between public/private/internal

title: Do you allow deletion/transfer of repos by members or just org owners?
Do you allow issues to be deleted by members or just org owners?
Are you enabling Codespaces enterprise wide?
Will you block matching public code suggestions for all orgs?
Have you decided if you will you enable copilot chat in the whole enterprise or set at org level?
description: At this time Copilot chat is in beta

title: Have you chosen which organizations on which to enable Copilot?
description: You can select a subset of orgs or the whole enterprise

title: Will you allow self-hosted runners at repo level?
Will you allow Runners against personal EMU namespaces?
Have you set a spending limit and enabled alerts?
description: You can set alerts at  at 75/90/100%

title: Have you setup billing emails?
Have you added an Azure subscription to payment information?
Do you have your recovery codes from the setup user somewhere very safe?
Will you automatically redirect users to your sign in page?
description: This makes it easier for users to get to the login page if required

title: Have you enabled the IP allow list for your IdP? (OIDC) or set restrictions (SAML)
Will you get repo admins enable/disable secret scanning and code scanning?
Have you enabled push protection for secrets?
description: GitHub Advanced Security includes secret and code scanning as well as Dependabot

title: Have you enabled Dependabot by default to protect against supply chain attacks?
Do you have a custom push protection URL to show to your users some help text?
Have you added approved domains so you can make sure alerts don't go to domains you don't want to share with?
Is Audit Log Streaming Enabled to keep over 3 months of logs if you require this?
description: This can help you meet your regulatory and compliance requirements

title: Is Source IP Disclosure enabled?
Audit Log API Request Events Enabled?
Have you set the members who can raise support cases with GitHub? (up to 20)
